body.name: Dr. Brown's Natural Flow® Anti-Colic Options+™ Narrow Bottle to Sippy Gift Set with Soft Silicone Sippy Spout, Removable Silicone Handles, Travel Cap and Bottle Brush
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 8 hrs 28 mins
features: ANTI-COLIC BABY BOTTLE. Anti-Colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Decreases spit-up, burping and gas.
CONSISTENT FLOW RATE. Vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so babies can feed at their own pace.
PRESERVES NUTRIENTS. The anti-colic vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep.
BREASTFEEDING BOTTLE. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again.

BOTTLE GROWS WITH BABY. Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ baby bottle works best with the internal vent system in place but can be removed as baby’s feeding develops – no need to introduce a different bottle.

BABY BOTTLE GIFT SET. As baby gets older, transition to sippy spout and easy grip silicone handles to teach new sippy skills. Store, transport and warm bottles with ease using the included storage/travel cap. Bottle brush included for easy cleaning.
SUSTAINABLE BABY BOTTLE. Dr. Brown’s Narrow bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable.

PLASTIC BANK COLLABORATION. Dr. Brown’s has collaborated with Plastic Bank to prevent ocean plastic and reduce their plastic footprint. Purchasing Dr. Brown’s baby bottles help toward their commitment to prevent 31 million plastic bottles from entering the ocean annually. Learn more at PlasticBank.com.
DISHWASHER SAFE. Bottles and silicone handles safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free.

Gift Set (0m+) Includes: 3 – 8oz/250mL bottles, 2 – 4oz/120mL bottles, 5 – Level 1 (Slow Flow) nipples, 2 – Level 2 (Medium Flow) nipples, 1 – Sippy spout (6m+), 1 – Silicone handles, 1 – Storage/travel cap, 1 – Bottle brush
body.description: Your options have never been better with Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow® Anti-Colic Options+™ Bottle to Sippy Gift Set. The anti-colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Dr. Brown’s bottles provide a more comfortable feeding experience for baby by decreasing spit-up, burping and gas. This vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so baby can feed at their own pace. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again. Dr. Brown’s vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep. The silicone nipple, together with the internal vent system, offer a reliable and trusted bottle feeding experience that makes Dr. Brown’s the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Baby Bottle in the U.S.* Made to grow with baby, our bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I previously reviewed these bottles and reported they leaked. I gave 3 stars, saying they were good for short term or temporary use. BUT I had to come back and leave a better review. I think the leaking must have been operator error, not screwing on tight enough. These are durable and good value, and I ended up buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the bottles but hate when it comes to washing them
reviews.reviewText: Great bottles! I tried a few different brands and this seems to work best for my baby. Definitely less gassy when he drinks out of this. The only con as you heard or read, cleaning is pain in the butt. I know you can wash them in the dishwasher but I hate that it doesn’t dry completely when it’s done and it takes forever. I have to separately dry them in the Dr. Brown sterilizer so that adds the extra time. Yes, I tried leaving the dishwasher open to let it dry overnight and I also put them in the bottle drying rack and there’s still water in them. I’m also paranoid about the dishwasher not cleaning the nipples and the vents properly so I just wash them separately. Overall it’s a great bottle. As long as it works and keeps my baby comfortable after feeding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best baby bottles for newborns .
reviews.reviewText: These Dr. Brown bottles are a family favorite. We’ve used them years ago on our own kids, and we were pleased to see that they had a set around for purchasing. We bought this set for my younger sibling and his wife, who recently had a baby, we love that these bottles really do help keep the gassiness that sometimes happens when you use bottles that just leaves your little one gassy. The bottle has a stem that allows the air to escape and prevent gassiness so the little ones can burp without feeling sick.We also love the affordability of the set that we purchased, as well as the ease of which to clean them, the set also comes with a brush, several different sizes and nipples for the bottles. All in all, a good buy and an affordable set for a new family with a little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: El kit muy completo, súper económico, excelente calidad y fue enviado bastante rápido. Los recomiendo 100%
